netadvanced.full_cone_nat_tips: Full Cone NAT can be used to reduce game latency, but enabling Full Cone NAT may be less secure.
netadvanced.sip_alg_tips: SIP ALG can be used to mitigate the effects of multiple NATs, but in most cases it will not help. Enabling SIP ALG may affect VoIP calls such as one-way audio (only one party can hear the other), phones not ringing during a call, phones dropping while connected, and calls going directly to voicemail.
